name: M.A.R.S
description:
Mars Analysis and Research Station (M.A.R.S) is a AI focused management game, where you must build a colony on mars.

You need to build Co2 scrubbers to produce oxygen, you need greenhouses to produce food so your colonists can eat and you need beds for them to sleep.

Dangerous events such as meteor showers and machines breaking down make it even harder to survive.

DISCLAIMER

This game has been made as a school project, it is not complete and probably won't be worked on further.
